testcase.name: With valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given a user exists with email "opa@1" and password "saugus"................passed When I POST to "/auth/login" with email "opa@1" and password "saugus".......passed Then I should receive a 200 status and a non-empty JWT token................passed

testcase.name: With invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given a user exists with email "opa@1" and password "nesaugus"..............passed When I POST to "/auth/login" with email "opa@1" and password "nesaugus".....passed Then I should receive a 401 status..........................................passed
